description.en: Datbit is a smart-contract blockchain platform where users can finally take over the control of their data. With the help of DBT coin, everyone can share and monetize the information they have on the marketplace and turn it into real value. Coin emission is limited to 1 billion coins, 60 mln of which will be distributed for the public sale and the rest will be used for data storage and sharing. Datbit is a unique opportunity for data owners to finally get paid for the researchers and studies they make or any information that they generate.
